description: Supervised practicum course to develop professional skills in applied psychology. Theories and techniques are applied in either the general area of psychology or GDPsyPrac student's chosen specialist stream. There is a possibility that students may be required to undertake site workshops prior to placements and these workshops may incur a fee which is payable to the placement provider.
prerequisites: Provisional or full registration as a Psychologist with the Psychology Board of Australia.
restricted: Restricted to MPsych and GDPsycPrac students or with the permission of Director of the MPsych Program
